page.title: 12Children's diet
page.content: We have been doing a survey on what children eat in our school.We can see from our survey most children who have breakfast have cereal,few children have no breakfast.Lots of children have school dinners and very few have sandwiches. Most children have a cooked meal for tea.Most children's favourite food is chips,very few children's favourite is sandwiches. Most children's favourite drink is milk.Squash and apple juice are less liked. This is what is in a typical lunchbox:sandwiches,drink,crisps, chocolate or an apple.A typical school dinner might be chips,two sausages and baked beans.For pudding we have treacle sponge.We can see that more children eat things that are bad for them,few children eat things that are good for them.
